company.name: Orbit Power Engineering
company.description: Orbit Power Engineering is an A-Class electrical service provider specializing in transmission and distribution solutions across India. Based in Hazratganj, Lucknow, we deliver reliable engineering, utility management, and system integration services with a focus on quality, transparency, and customer satisfaction. We are committed to efficient project execution, timely delivery, and building long-term partnerships through integrity and innovation.
company.mission: Our mission is to deliver reliable, efficient, and innovative power utility solutions that strengthen Indiaâ€™s transmission and distribution network. We strive to achieve excellence through cutting-edge technology, uncompromised quality, and a customer-first approach. By fostering a culture of learning, integrity, and accountability, we aim to create sustainable growth for our clients, our employees, and the power sector as a whole.

team.name: Rajesh Kumar
team.bio: Over 20 years of experience in electrical engineering and utility management with a focus on operational excellence.

team.name: Priya Khanna
team.bio: Expert in advanced electrical systems and technology integration with a background in smart grid solutions.

team.bio: Lead electrical engineer with expertise in transmission and distribution systems and safety compliance.
